about.headline: Hey ðŸ‘‹
about.description:
I'm Jens-Mikael Stjernberg, an 18-year-old young entrepreneur from Finland. I've been programming for four years already, and although I'm still in high school, I passionately build professional-level web projects.

I founded Stjernberg Web and IT Services in fall 2024, when traditional summer jobs no longer inspired me and I wanted to take on new challenges as an entrepreneur in the world of software. Since then, Iâ€™ve completed numerous IT projects globally â€“ not only in Finland, but also in the United States and Germany.

Music and sports have always been important to me. When Iâ€™m not coding, I play the guitar or piano, or I hit the gym hard enough to make walking difficult the next day.

I come from a multilingual entrepreneurial family from Norway. At home, we speak three languages: Finnish, Swedish, and Norwegian. In addition, I speak fluent English and have studied German in school for five years.

So, if you're looking for passionate and multilingual IT help, donâ€™t hesitate to get in touch â€“ letâ€™s make your vision a reality!

...and anything else you might need. Contact us and let us know what youâ€™re looking for. 

Note! If you're looking for more technical services, check [here](/services/software-development).

1.headline: Visual Design
1.description: We build visually impressive and user-friendly websites at a reasonable price, helping you stand out from the competition and grow your business.

2.headline: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
2.description: Since most customers find companies online, SEO is critical. We ensure maximum visibility and keyword optimization for your site.

hansatorin-apteekki.description: We built a website for the pharmacy in Turku from the ground up, designed a clear interface, improved search (SEO) visibility, reduced ongoing costs, and enabled easy content management via Google Sheets.

roof-history.description: We designed and implemented scalable server architecture, secure login features, and a better user interface. We also enhanced SEO and added address search and verification via Google Cloud (GCS) for fast, clear, and reliable performance.

harri-vaelilae.content: Exceptional freelance services! Jens is a Very skilled and quick developer, with impressive learning and adaptability. They consistently offered valuable suggestions that benefited our projects. Strong understanding of modern standards and seamless collaboration. Their cheerful, proactive, and smart approach made working together easy and enjoyable. Highly recommended!

dan-sveen.content: I recently hired Jens to develop the backend of my website, and I couldnâ€™t be happier with the strong, efficient, and scalable results. Communication was seamless, they provided valuable insights, and I highly recommend their high-quality backend services.

hannu-valve.content: Working with Jens was a great experience â€“ they were detail-oriented, proactive in solving challenges, and ensured smooth communication throughout. Their dedication made the whole project seamless and enjoyable.

Communication was never a problem he always responded as quickly as possible (sometimes heâ€˜s a bit busy). I will definitly come back for any to-be-established website projects.
